'''Manzana''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Ancestral Temple}}.

==Gameplay Note==
This NPC is only available at the location for the Warrior's challenge after the completion of the {{Quest|To the Night, What is the Night's}}.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Manzana:''' This [[Warrior's Challenge]] is designed for couriers, so it will be tough. Not that I'm underestimating you, of course.
:'''Manzana:''' How about it? Want to give it a go?
:{{DIcon|Warrior's Challenge}} Let's begin!
:;(Opens Warrior's Challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} Give me a moment to prep...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available during the Warrior's Challenge''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Manzana:''' Use the grappling hook... or other means, to collect the explosive barrels and defeat your foes. This, too, is one the messenger's many tasks... sorta.
{{Dialogue End}}
